description:
As a member of the famous marines commando, you are sent on a perilous mission in an hostile territory.
Defeat the ennemies and their powerfull weapons and fight bosses til victory.

Vast variety of weapons:

Player:
-Handgun
-Machine gun
-Rocket
-Shotgun
-Grenade

Enemy:
-5 Bosses fight scenes
-Helicopter
-Tank
-Turret
-Rocket
-Soldiers (Throw, Parachute, Melee, Gun,...)
name: Mission Commando
